# hasProjectPreview

**Instance Property**

A property that indicates whether a project preview was previously set.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasProjectPreview: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

To set the preview, use [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHProjectChangeRequest/setProjectPreviewImage(_:)].

## Project Extension Properties

- **projectExtensionData**: Data associated with the project extension.

items.description: Data associated with the project extension.
